creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: colorful images of male monks and dignitaries praying, and conferring; scene with three golden Bodhisattvas; interspersed with text blocks

portfolio: From Illustrations of the Life and Deeds of the Grand Master of Mount Kōya (Kōya Daishi gyōjō zuga 高野大師行状図画)
title: Illustrations of the Life and Deeds of the Grand Master of Mount Kōya, vol. 4
